Just below the window a dining table was set up on metal legs, along with colorful, eye-catching chairs :)

name: GDA DP 412
headline: {'en': 'Deo Plaza - a premium apartment with a terrace', 'pl': 'Deo Plaza - apartament premium z tarasem'}
description:
{'en': "## Space

Our fully equipped 4 * apartment consists of five rooms. On over 65 square meters there are:

âœ“ elegant living room and loggia
âœ“ bright bedroom

âœ“ stylish bathroom
âœ“ roomy wardrobe

! We offer breakfast - 35 PLN per person to order at the reception or immediately after booking

## Access

We know that our guests value comfort and the opportunity to relax, which is why we focused on convenience and functionality, without sacrificing interesting interior design.

The central place in the living room is occupied by a large, comfortable sofa in a beautiful shade of green. From it you can admire the panorama of the Old Town or watch a movie. The couch is foldable.

The living room turns into a built-in loggia with an amazing view of the Old Town and the river. Comfortable armchairs and a table make this corner the best place to drink morning coffee,

We also remembered those who during their stay will need a moment of focus at the desk. The office corner is the perfect place to work with a laptop.

A bright bedroom with a comfortable double bed will ensure a good night's sleep. From the bed you can admire the view of MotÅ‚awa and the Old Town.

The kitchen with a table for four is equipped with the necessary accessories and cooking equipment: in addition to the stove and coffee maker, it also has an oven and a dishwasher. Wine lovers will appreciate the cooler that will keep the drink at the perfect temperature.

## Interaction

âœ† Throughout the entire stay of guests, we are available by phone and in the office - ready to help in case of any problems.

## Neighborhood

In the heart of Gdansk

Our Deo Residence & Spa apartments are located on Granary Island, right on the MotÅ‚awa River. They are part of the Deo Plaza complex - it is a former granary, one of three survivors of the conflagration. Its current appearance retains the silhouette it was given before 1910 and after the fire of 1930. During the renovation, conservation procedures referring to the color of historic GdaÅ„sk (color of the walls, frames of shutters and entrances) were introduced, showing respect for the historical values ​​of the object and place.

Deo Residence is located on the MotÅ‚awa River itself, from the island it is located at Chmielna - the main street of Wyspa SpichrzÃ³w. Perpendicular to the waterfront and Chmielna Street, Deo Residence is bordered by ul. StÄ…giewna, which passes the Green Bridge and is an extension of the Long Market, and thus the Royal Road.

In Deo Plaza you will find restaurants for less and greater hunger, including Salty Granary, Genesis, Woosabi and Whiskey in the Jar. If you fancy a coffee or something sweet, you can look into Wedel, and for a beer trip, Riverside by Pilsner is recommended.

In addition, you can spend the evening in the Sassy club, also on the roof of Deo (Sassy Rooftop)!

Do you want to take care of yourself? Plan a relaxing visit to Prana Spa or refresh your hairstyle in Yes! Show Me Love.

## Transit

Just 270 meters to the nearest bus stop.

## Notes

The check-in fee that requires our assistance between 22:00 and 24:00 is PLN 50.
The check-in fee requiring our assistance after 24:00 is PLN 100.

name: GDA DP 410A
headline: {'en': 'Deo Plaza - apartment with a view of the MotÅ‚awa', 'pl': 'Deo Plaza - apartament z widokiem na MotÅ‚awÄ™'}
description:
{'en': '# Space

The four-person studio apartment includes:
âœ“ large, glazed loggia
âœ“ sleeping area, from which you can admire the view of MotÅ‚awa and the Old Town
âœ“ a living area with a large, comfortable sofa that can be folded out
âœ“ open, fully equipped kitchen with stove, fridge, dishwasher 
âœ“ dining room connected with the living room
âœ“ fully equipped, separate bathroom with a large shower

! We offer breakfast - 35 PLN per person to order at the reception or immediately after booking

# Access 

We know that our guests value comfort and the opportunity to relax, which is why we focused on convenience and functionality, without sacrificing interesting interior design. The elegant, spacious apartment has been fully equipped with all necessary amenities.

# Interaction

We know that our guests value comfort and the opportunity to relax, which is why we focused on convenience and functionality, without sacrificing interesting interior design. The elegant, spacious apartment has been fully equipped with all necessary amenities.

# Location

In the heart of Gdansk

Our Deo Residence & Spa apartments are located on Granary Island, right on the MotÅ‚awa River. They are part of the Deo Plaza complex - it is a former granary, one of the three survivors of the conflagration. Its current appearance retains the silhouette that was given to it before 1910 and after the fire of 1930. During the renovation, conservation procedures referring to the color of historic GdaÅ„sk (color of the walls, frames of shutters and entrances) were introduced, showing respect for the historical values ​​of the object and place.

Deo Residence is located on the MotÅ‚awa River itself, from the island it is located at Chmielna - the main street of Wyspa SpichrzÃ³w. Perpendicular to the waterfront and Chmielna Street, Deo Residence is bordered by ul. StÄ…giewna, which passes through the Green Bridge and is an extension of the Long Market, and thus the Royal Road.

In Deo Plaza you will find restaurants for less and greater hunger, including Salty Granary, Genesis, Woosabi and Whiskey in the Jar. If you fancy a coffee or something sweet, you can look into Wedel, and for a beer trip, Riverside by Pilsner is recommended.

In addition, you can spend the evening in the Sassy club, also on the roof of Deo (Sassy Rooftop)!

Do you want to take care of yourself? Plan a relaxing visit to Prana Spa or refresh your hairstyle in Yes! Show Me Love.

# Transit

Just 270 meters to the nearest bus stop.

# Notes

The check-in fee that requires our assistance between 22:00 and 24:00 is PLN 50.
The check-in fee requiring our assistance after 24:00 is PLN 100.
Extending the check-out time until 13:00 is associated with a fee of PLN 50.
Check-out after 13:00 will incur a charge for the next full day.

It is possible to rent a parking space for an additional 60 PLN / day.

Deo Residence & Spa is a completely new facility, some of its parts are still undergoing finishing works. From 9-18 (Monday-Friday) and 9-14 (Saturday) you can hear renovation teams. We hope that despite this, your stay with us will be in maximum comfort.

The apartment is not allowed to organize events. There is a curfew at 22-6.', 'pl': '# Miejsce

name: GDA DP 121B
headline: {'en': 'DEO Plaza - an elegant apartment for two', 'pl': 'DEO Plaza - elegancki apartament dla dwojga'}
description:
{'en': '## Space

An elegant room for a couple has everything necessary for a fully comfortable stay.
! We offer breakfast - 35 PLN per person to order at the reception or immediately after booking

## Access

In addition to a comfortable bed, an ideal place to relax with a book or a cup of tea (in the room you will find an electric kettle) will be a chair with a coffee table.

From behind ground-reaching windows you can see StÄ…giewna Street, an extension of the GdaÅ„sk Royal Road. Large windows make the room visible and we gain a sense of additional space.

For people who need a moment of focus at the desk, we have prepared a work corner with a comfortable chair and an additional lamp.

The spacious wardrobe can accommodate all luggage, even for people staying with us for longer. You will always have a chilled drink on hand thanks to the fridge you will find in the cabinet.

An elegant bathroom with a rain shower is equipped with necessary cosmetics and a hair dryer, we also provide a set of towels. An additional small mirror with backlight will facilitate daily care.

For guests of Deo Residence & Spa apartments under the care of Rent like home is our reception, and for an additional fee also parking and concierge services.

The facility is under 24-hour security.

## Interaction

âœ† Throughout the entire stay of guests, we are available by phone and in the office - ready to help in case of any problems.

## Neighborhood

In the heart of Gdansk

Our Deo Residence & Spa apartments are located on Granary Island, right on the MotÅ‚awa River. They are part of the Deo Plaza complex - it is a former granary, one of three survivors of the war conflagration. Its current appearance retains the silhouette it was given before 1910 and after the fire of 1930. During the renovation, conservation procedures referring to the color of historic GdaÅ„sk (color of the walls, frames of shutters and entrances) were introduced, showing respect for the historical values ​​of the object and place.

Deo Residence is located on the MotÅ‚awa River itself, from the island it is located at Chmielna - the main street of Wyspa SpichrzÃ³w. Perpendicular to the waterfront and Chmielna Street, Deo Residence is bordered by ul. StÄ…giewna, which passes the Green Bridge and is an extension of the Long Market, and thus the Royal Road.

In Deo Plaza you will find restaurants for less and greater hunger, including Salty Granary, Genesis, Woosabi and Whiskey in the Jar. If you fancy a coffee or something sweet, you can look into Wedel, and for a beer trip, Riverside by Pilsner is recommended.

In addition, you can spend the evening in the Sassy club, also on the roof of Deo (Sassy Rooftop)!

Do you want to take care of yourself? Plan a relaxing visit to Prana Spa or refresh your hairstyle in Yes! Show Me Love.

## Transit

Just 270 meters to the nearest bus stop.

## Notes

The check-in fee that requires our assistance between 22:00 and 24:00 is PLN 50.
The check-in fee requiring our assistance after 24:00 is PLN 100.
Extending the check-out time until 13:00 is associated with a fee of PLN 50.
Check-out after 13:00 will incur a charge for the next full day.

{'en': "# Space

A classic room for two, equipped with a 4 * standard - you'll find everything you need for a comfortable stay.
! We offer breakfast - 35 PLN per person to order at the reception or immediately after booking

# Access

A large, double bed will allow you to unwind after a long day of sightseeing. You can drink your morning coffee in the room - among the amenities there is a kettle and a coffee and tea set as well as a fridge.

Capacious lockers will fit all your luggage.

The check-in fee that requires our assistance after 24:00 is PLN 100.
Extending the check-out time until 13:00 is associated with a fee of PLN 50.
Check-out after 13:00 will incur a charge for the next full day.

It is possible to rent a parking space for an additional 60 PLN / day.

Deo Residence & Spa is a completely new facility, some of its parts are still undergoing finishing works. From 9-18 (Monday-Friday) and 9-14 (Saturday) you can hear renovation teams. We hope that despite this your stay with us will be in maximum comfort.

The apartment is not allowed to organize events. Quiet hours between 22-6.

# Location

In the heart of Gdansk

Our Deo Residence & Spa apartments are located on Granary Island, right on the MotÅ‚awa River. They are part of the Deo Plaza complex - it is a former granary, one of three survivors of the conflagration. Its current appearance retains the silhouette it was given before 1910 and after the fire of 1930. During the renovation, conservation procedures referring to the color of historic GdaÅ„sk (color of the walls, frames of shutters and entrances) were introduced, showing respect for the historical values ​​of the object and place.

Deo Residence is located on the MotÅ‚awa River itself, from the island it is located at Chmielna - the main street of Wyspa SpichrzÃ³w. In addition, you can spend the evening in the Sassy club, also on the roof of Deo (Sassy Rooftop)!

Do you want to take care of yourself? Plan a relaxing visit to Prana Spa or refresh your hairstyle in Yes! Show Me Love.

The spacious wardrobe can accommodate all luggage, even for people staying with us for longer. You will always have a chilled drink on hand thanks to the fridge you will find in the cabinet.

An elegant bathroom with a rain shower is equipped with necessary cosmetics and a hair dryer, we also provide a set of towels. An additional small mirror with backlight will facilitate daily care.

For guests of Deo Residence & Spa apartments under the care of Rent like home is our reception, and for an additional fee also parking and concierge services.

The facility is under 24-hour security.

In addition, you can spend the evening in the Sassy club, also on the roof of Deo (Sassy Rooftop)!

Do you want to take care of yourself? Plan a relaxing visit to Prana Spa or refresh your hairstyle in Yes! Show Me Love.

## Transit

Just 270 meters to the nearest bus stop.

## Notes

The check-in fee that requires our assistance between 22:00 and 24:00 is PLN 50.

name: GDA DP 515A
headline: {'en': 'Deo Plaza - comfortable apt. with air conditioning', 'pl': 'Deo Plaza - wygodny apartament z klimatyzacjÄ…'}
description:
{'en': '## Space

From behind the windows reaching to the ground, you can see atmospheric tenement houses on StÄ…giewna Street, an extension of the Long Market. Large windows make the apartment bright and we gain a sense of additional space.


This studio apartment includes:
âœ“ comfortable living room connected to the sleeping area
âœ“ fully equipped kitchen
âœ“ stylish, separate bathroom

! We offer breakfast - 35 PLN per person to order at the reception or immediately after booking

## Access

The sleeping area of the studio is located next to the floor-length window and has a double bed, very comfortable, from which you can admire the Granary Island or watch TV comfortably. An armchair covered with velor is also ideal for relaxing.

A functional kitchen with a fridge (with a freezer), a stove, a microwave and a dishwasher will allow you to prepare homemade meals that we can eat at a large, comfortable table located in the common space of the kitchen with the living room. A quadruple table allows for comfort during meals

Both in the living room and in the bedroom, the decorator chose a delicate, powder shade of pink. The marble referring to the interior of the Deo complex decorates kitchen elements, a table in the living room and a bathroom.

## Interaction

âœ† Throughout the entire stay of guests, we are available by phone and in the office - ready to help in case of any problems.

## Neighborhood

In the heart of Gdansk

Our Deo Residence & Spa apartments are located on Granary Island, right on the MotÅ‚awa River. They are part of the Deo Plaza complex - it is a former granary, one of three survivors of the conflagration. Its current appearance retains the silhouette it was given before 1910 and after the fire of 1930. During the renovation, conservation procedures referring to the color of historic GdaÅ„sk (color of the walls, frames of shutters and entrances) were introduced, showing respect for the historical values ​​of the object and place.

Deo Residence is located on the MotÅ‚awa River itself, from the island it is located at Chmielna - the main street of Wyspa SpichrzÃ³w. Perpendicular to the waterfront and Chmielna Street, Deo Residence is bordered by ul. StÄ…giewna, which passes the Green Bridge and is an extension of the Long Market, and thus the Royal Road.

In Deo Plaza you will find restaurants for less and greater hunger, including Salty Granary, Genesis, Woosabi and Whiskey in the Jar. If you fancy a coffee or something sweet, you can look into Wedel, and for a beer trip, Riverside by Pilsner is recommended.

In addition, you can spend the evening in the Sassy club, also on the roof of Deo (Sassy Rooftop)!

Do you want to take care of yourself? Plan a relaxing visit to Prana Spa or refresh your hairstyle in Yes! Show Me Love.

## Transit

Just 270 meters to the nearest bus stop.

## Notes

You can also relax on the functional sofa or in the armchair in the living room.

In both the living room and bedroom, the decorator chose subdued shades of green. The marble referring to the interior of the Deo complex decorates kitchen elements and a table in the living room.


Thanks to the sofa bed, the apartment can accommodate up to 4 people.

The living room has been combined with an open kitchen, which gives the impression of additional space and makes spending time together more enjoyable. A quadruple table allows for comfort during meals that you will prepare in a fully equipped kitchen, with a microwave, stove and fridge with freezer.

In addition, you can spend the evening in the Sassy club, also on the roof of Deo (Sassy Rooftop)!

headline: {'en': 'Deo Plaza - tropical apartment with a terrace', 'pl': 'Deo Plaza - tropikalny apartament z tarasem'}
description:
{'en': '## Space

An elegant room for a couple has everything necessary for a fully comfortable stay.
! We offer breakfast - 35 PLN per person to order at the reception or immediately after booking

## Access

In addition to a comfortable bed, an ideal place to relax with a book or a cup of tea (in the room you will find an electric kettle) will be a chair with a coffee table.

From behind the ground-reaching windows you can see StÄ…giewna Street, an extension of the GdaÅ„sk Royal Road. Large windows make the room visible and we gain a sense of additional space.

For people who need a moment of focus at the desk, we have prepared a work corner with a comfortable chair and an additional lamp.

The spacious wardrobe can accommodate all luggage, even for people staying with us for longer. You will always have a chilled drink on hand thanks to the fridge you will find in the cabinet.

An elegant bathroom with a rain shower is equipped with necessary cosmetics and a hair dryer, we also provide a set of towels. An additional small mirror with backlight will facilitate daily care.

For guests of Deo Residence & Spa apartments under the care of Rent like home is our reception, and for an additional fee also parking and concierge services.

The facility is under 24-hour security.

## Interaction

âœ† Throughout the entire stay of guests, we are available by phone and in the office - ready to help in case of any problems.

## Neighborhood

In the heart of Gdansk

Our Deo Residence & Spa apartments are located on Granary Island, right on the MotÅ‚awa River. They are part of the Deo Plaza complex - it is a former granary, one of three survivors of the conflagration. Its current appearance retains the silhouette it was given before 1910 and after the fire of 1930. During the renovation, conservation procedures referring to the color of historic GdaÅ„sk (color of the walls, frames of shutters and entrances) were introduced, showing respect for the historical values ​​of the object and place.

Deo Residence is located on the MotÅ‚awa River itself, from the island it is located at Chmielna - the main street of Wyspa SpichrzÃ³w. Perpendicular to the waterfront and Chmielna Street, Deo Residence is bordered by ul. StÄ…giewna, which passes the Green Bridge and is an extension of the Long Market, and thus the Royal Road.

In Deo Plaza you will find restaurants for less and greater hunger, including Salty Granary, Genesis, Woosabi and Whiskey in the Jar. If you fancy a coffee or something sweet, you can look into Wedel, and for a beer trip, Riverside by Pilsner is recommended.

In addition, you can spend the evening in the Sassy club, also on the roof of Deo (Sassy Rooftop)!

Do you want to take care of yourself? Plan a relaxing visit to Prana Spa or refresh your hairstyle in Yes! Show Me Love.

## Transit

Just 270 meters to the nearest bus stop.

## Notes

The check-in fee requiring our assistance between 22:00 and 24:00 is PLN 50.
The check-in fee that requires our assistance after 24:00 is PLN 100.
Extending the check-out time until 13:00 is associated with a fee of PLN 50.
Check-out after 13:00 will incur a charge for the next full day.

It is possible to rent a parking space for an additional 60 PLN / day.', 'pl': '## Miejsce

Elegancka Å‚azienka z deszczownicÄ… zostaÅ‚a wyposaÅ¼ona w niezbÄ™dne kosmetyki oraz suszarkÄ™ do wÅ‚osÃ³w, zapewniamy takÅ¼e komplet rÄ™cznikÃ³w. Dodatkowe maÅ‚e lusterko z podÅ›wietleniem uÅ‚atwi codziennÄ… pielÄ™gnacjÄ™.

Do dyspozycji GoÅ›ci apartamentÃ³w Deo Residence & Spa pod opiekÄ… Rent like home jest nasza recepcja, a za dodatkowÄ… opÅ‚atÄ… takÅ¼e parking oraz usÅ‚ugi concierge.

## W trakcie pobytu

##  Lokalizacja

W samym sercu GdaÅ„ska

Nasze apartamenty Deo Residence & Spa znajdujÄ… siÄ™ na Wyspie SpichrzÃ³w, nad samÄ… MotÅ‚awÄ…. SÄ… czÄ™Å›ciÄ… kompleksu Deo Plaza - jest to dawny spichlerz, jeden z trzech ocalaÅ‚ych z poÅ¼ogi wojennej. description:

âœ“ 2 separate bedrooms

The dining room connected to the living room and the fold-out sofa standing near the windows can be your space for spending time together. From here you can admire the view of the MotÅ‚awa River and the panorama of the Old Town - it will be best seen from the large, glazed loggia.

The kitchen area has a stove, fridge and dishwasher and all necessary equipment.

Two separate bedrooms are Premium double rooms. They have been equipped with a 4 * standard, with all necessary amenities

Both rooms have their own bathroom with shower and separate entrance. In each bedroom, apart from a comfortable double bed, there is a mini fridge, a kettle with coffee and tea set and a spacious wardrobe.

âœ† Throughout the entire stay of guests, we are available by phone and in the office - ready to help in case of any problems.

Its current appearance retains the silhouette it was given before 1910 and after the fire of 1930. Deo Residence is located on the MotÅ‚awa River itself, from the island it is located at Chmielna - the main street of Wyspa SpichrzÃ³w. Perpendicular to the waterfront and Chmielna Street, Deo Residence is bordered by ul. StÄ…giewna, which passes the Green Bridge and is an extension of the Long Market, and thus the Royal Road.

In addition, you can spend the evening in the Sassy club, also on the roof of Deo (Sassy Rooftop)!

Do you want to take care of yourself? Plan a relaxing visit to Prana Spa or refresh your hairstyle in Yes! Show Me Love.

## Transit

Just 270 meters to the nearest bus stop.

## Notes

The check-in fee requiring our assistance between 22:00 and 24:00 is PLN 50.

It is possible to rent a parking space for an additional 60 PLN / day.

Deo Residence & Spa is a completely new facility, some of its parts are still undergoing finishing works. From 9-18 (Monday-Friday) and 9-14 (Saturday) you can hear renovation teams. We hope that despite this your stay with us will be in maximum comfort.

name: GDA DP 405
headline: {'en': 'Deo Plaza - a luxury apartment with a view of the Old Town', 'pl': 'Deo Plaza - lux apartament z widokiem na StarÃ³wkÄ™'}
description:
{'en': '## Space

We know that our guests value comfort and the opportunity to relax, which is why we focused on convenience and functionality, without sacrificing interesting interior design.

The elegant, spacious apartment has been fully equipped with all necessary amenities. It will ensure a comfortable stay for a family or group of friends - the space in the living room will allow you to spend time together and admire the view of the MotÅ‚awa and the Old Town from a sofa or from a glazed balcony. In turn, thanks to separate bedrooms with their own bathrooms, privacy is guaranteed.

! We offer breakfast - 35 PLN per person to order at the reception or immediately after booking

## Access

On the 85 square meters apartment were:

âœ“ open living room with sleeping area
âœ“ a living area with a large, comfortable sofa that can be folded out
âœ“ 3 bathrooms
âœ“ 2 separate bedrooms
âœ“ open, fully equipped kitchen with stove, oven, dishwasher, fridge and freezer
âœ“ large, glazed loggia

The main part of the apartment is a studio: living room with sleeping area open to a modern kitchen. The dining room connected to the living room and the fold-out sofa standing near the windows can be your space for spending time together. From here you can admire the view of the MotÅ‚awa River and the panorama of the Old Town - it will be best seen from the large, glass loggia.

The kitchen area has a stove, fridge and all necessary equipment.

Two separate bedrooms are Premium double rooms. They have been equipped with a 4 * standard, with all necessary amenities

Both rooms have their own bathroom with shower and separate entrance. In each bedroom, apart from a comfortable double bed, there is a mini fridge, a kettle with coffee and tea set and a spacious wardrobe.

## Interaction

âœ† Throughout the entire stay of guests, we are available by phone and in the office - ready to help in case of any problems.

## Neighborhood

In the heart of Gdansk

Our Deo Residence & Spa apartments are located on Granary Island, right on the MotÅ‚awa River. They are part of the Deo Plaza complex - it is a former granary, one of the three survivors of the conflagration. Its current appearance retains the silhouette that was given to it before 1910 and after the fire of 1930. During the renovation, conservation procedures referring to the color of historic GdaÅ„sk (color of the walls, frames of shutters and entrances) were introduced, showing respect for the historical values ​​of the object and place.

Deo Residence is located on the MotÅ‚awa River itself, from the island it is located at Chmielna - the main street of Wyspa SpichrzÃ³w. Perpendicular to the waterfront and Chmielna Street, Deo Residence is bordered by ul. StÄ…giewna, which passes through the Green Bridge and is an extension of the Long Market, and thus the Royal Road.

In Deo Plaza you will find restaurants for less and greater hunger, including Salty Granary, Genesis, Woosabi and Whiskey in the Jar. If you fancy a coffee or something sweet, you can look into Wedel, and for a beer trip, Riverside by Pilsner is recommended.

In addition, you can spend the evening in the Sassy club, also on the roof of Deo (Sassy Rooftop)!

Do you want to take care of yourself? Plan a relaxing visit to Prana Spa or refresh your hairstyle in Yes! Show Me Love.

## Transit

Just 270 meters to the nearest bus stop.

## Notes

The check-in fee that requires our assistance between 22:00 and 24:00 is PLN 50.
The check-in fee requiring our assistance after 24:00 is PLN 100.
Extending the check-out time until 13:00 is associated with a fee of PLN 50.
Check-out after 13:00 will incur a charge for the next full day.

It is possible to rent a parking space for an additional 60 PLN / day.

Deo Residence & Spa is a completely new facility, some of its parts are still undergoing finishing works. From 9-18 (Monday-Friday) and 9-14 (Saturday) you can hear renovation teams. We hope that despite this, your stay with us will be in maximum comfort.

name: GDA DP 518

description:
{'en': '## Space

We know that our guests value comfort and the opportunity to relax, which is why we focused on comfort and functionality, without sacrificing elegant decor.

The delicate, wood-pastel interior combined with large windows and a glazed loggia is the perfect place to relax for a couple.

At over 45 sq m were found:

The spacious loggia is an additional over 19 meters of space!

! We offer breakfast - 35 PLN per person to order at the reception or immediately after booking

## Access

The most important element of the bedroom is a very comfortable double bed, from which you can admire the Granary Island or watch a comfortable movie.

You can also relax on the functional sofa or in the armchair in the living room.

In both the living room and bedroom, the decorator chose subdued shades of green. The marble referring to the interior of the Deo complex decorates kitchen elements and a table in the living room.


Thanks to the sofa bed, the apartment can accommodate up to 4 people.

The living room has been combined with an open kitchen, which gives the impression of additional space and makes spending time together more enjoyable. A quadruple table allows for comfort during meals that you will prepare in a fully equipped kitchen, with a microwave, stove and fridge with freezer.

The comfortable bathroom with a shower has all the necessary cosmetics, towels and a hair dryer.

## Interaction

âœ† Throughout the entire stay of guests, we are available by phone and in the office - ready to help in case of any problems.

In addition, you can spend the evening in the Sassy club, also on the roof of Deo (Sassy Rooftop)!

Do you want to take care of yourself? Plan a relaxing visit to Prana Spa or refresh your hairstyle in Yes! Show Me Love.

## Transit

Just 270 meters to the nearest bus stop.

name: GDA DP 210

description:
{'en': '## Space

We know that our guests value comfort and the opportunity to relax, which is why we focused on convenience and functionality, without sacrificing interesting interior design.

The elegant, spacious apartment has been fully equipped with all necessary amenities. It will ensure a comfortable stay for a family or group of friends - the space in the living room will allow you to spend time together and admire the view of the MotÅ‚awa and the Old Town from a sofa or from the balcony. In turn, thanks to separate bedrooms with their own bathrooms, privacy is guaranteed.

! We offer breakfast - 35 PLN per person to order at the reception or immediately after booking

## Access

The 94 square meters apartment has:

âœ“ open living room with sleeping area
âœ“ 3 bathrooms
âœ“ 2 separate bedrooms
âœ“ open, fully equipped kitchen with stove, oven, dishwasher, fridge and freezer
âœ“ large terrace

The main part of the apartment is a studio: living room with sleeping area open to a modern kitchen. The dining room connected to the living room and the fold-out sofa standing near the windows can be your space for spending time together. From here you can admire the view of the MotÅ‚awa River and the panorama of the Old Town - it will be best seen from the terrace.

The kitchen area has a stove, fridge and all necessary equipment.

Two separate bedrooms are Premium double rooms. They have been equipped with a 4 * standard, with all necessary amenities

Both rooms have their own bathroom with shower and separate entrance. In each bedroom, apart from a comfortable double bed, there is a mini fridge, a kettle with coffee and tea set and a spacious wardrobe.

## Interaction

âœ† Throughout the entire stay of guests, we are available by phone and in the office - ready to help in case of any problems.

## Neighborhood

In the heart of Gdansk

Our Deo Residence & Spa apartments are located on Granary Island, right on the MotÅ‚awa River. They are part of the Deo Plaza complex - it is a former granary, one of the three survivors of the conflagration. Its current appearance retains the silhouette that was given to it before 1910 and after the fire of 1930. During the renovation, conservation procedures referring to the color of historic GdaÅ„sk (color of the walls, frames of shutters and entrances) were introduced, showing respect for the historical values ​​of the object and place.

Deo Residence is located on the MotÅ‚awa River itself, from the island it is located at Chmielna - the main street of Wyspa SpichrzÃ³w. Perpendicular to the waterfront and Chmielna Street, Deo Residence is bordered by ul. StÄ…giewna, which passes through the Green Bridge and is an extension of the Long Market, and thus the Royal Road.

In Deo Plaza you will find restaurants for less and greater hunger, including Salty Granary, Genesis, Woosabi and Whiskey in the Jar. If you fancy a coffee or something sweet, you can look into Wedel, and for a beer trip, Riverside by Pilsner is recommended.

In addition, you can spend the evening in the Sassy club, also on the roof of Deo (Sassy Rooftop)!

Do you want to take care of yourself? Plan a relaxing visit to Prana Spa or refresh your hairstyle in Yes! Show Me Love.

## Transit

Just 270 meters to the nearest bus stop.

## Notes

The check-in fee that requires our assistance between 22:00 and 24:00 is PLN 50.
The check-in fee requiring our assistance after 24:00 is PLN 100.
Extending the check-out time until 13:00 is associated with a fee of PLN 50.
Check-out after 13:00 will incur a charge for the next full day.

It is possible to rent a parking space for an additional 60 PLN / day.

Deo Residence & Spa is a completely new facility, some of its parts are still undergoing finishing works. From 9-18 (Monday-Friday) and 9-14 (Saturday) you can hear renovation teams. We hope that despite this, your stay with us will be in maximum comfort.

Just 270 meters to the nearest bus stop.

description:
{'en': '## Space

## Access

The most important element of the bedroom is the comfortable bed.

A double table allows for comfort during meals, which you will prepare in a fully equipped kitchen, with a microwave, stove, dishwasher and fridge with freezer.

The comfortable bathroom with a shower has all necessary cosmetics, towels and a hair dryer.

âœ† Throughout the entire stay of guests, we are available by phone and in the office - ready to help in case of any problems.

Just 270 meters to the nearest bus stop.

Capacious lockers will fit all your luggage.

The room has its own bathroom with shower.

Deo Residence & Spa is a completely new facility, some of its parts are still undergoing finishing works. From 9-18 (Monday-Friday) and 9-14 (Saturday) you can hear renovation teams. We hope that despite this your stay with us will be in maximum comfort.

The apartment is not allowed to organize events. Quiet hours between 22-6.
